name: Eclipse: Light
desc: Eclipse's blades glow like starlit night sky, causing it to shed light as a torch until you deactivate it as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

hints.desc: Eclipse's blades glow like starlit night sky, causing it to shed light as a torch.

name: Eclipse: Stealth
desc: You absorb light, gaining a +2 status bonus to the triggering Stealth check.
